title: H is for Hawk - transition word

content.question: In the final sentence, the word “But” underscores which insight?

choices.label: The effort to train a new hawk drains the author physically and emotionally.
The author’s goal for hawks is for them to take the lead so she can follow.
The skill that is an asset during hawk training is otherwise a liability for the author.
The author’s boastful attitude stems from the hard work it took to be a hawk trainer.

content.answer: The skill that is an asset during hawk training is otherwise a liability for the author.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
